value.string: This bot does all CRUD operation in excel sheet by oledb connection
Modified By :  Banabihari , Date : 5th May , Fine tune the code
Supply Input parameters : Comment on GO-LIVE,  This step is to supply the input parameters of the bot if any to run the bot independently, mostly used for debuging purpose
Configuration :  This section is to set the configuration parameters. Set dicConfig from master config i_Config
calling sp : rpa_GetInvoiceTrnIDs to get dtInvoiceTrnId
checking and creating destination folder where the GST invoice will ve saved.
calling 4 SP to get the result set H,T,G,F and storing it in a dictionary
Calling EssplExcelReport to generate gst Invoices
calling EssplDatabaseBot to call SP : rpa_UpdateGSTProcessingStatus as GST invoice is being generating.
removing Keys dicGSTInvoiceData to store new result set
update status using rpa_UpdateGSTProcessingStatus agter generating GSTInvoice
creating zip for all the generated GST Invoices
Core Coding Section:  Business code starts from here

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: i_Config
variables.description: Holds all configuration data for all bots

variables.name: strGSTInvoiceCollectionFolder
variables.description: stores the folder name for saving the generated gst Invoices

variables.name: strGSTInvoiceFolderLocation
variables.description: stores the folder location where the file is being saved
